MonsterTrait.Name: Devil's Sight
MonsterTrait.Text: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: The devil's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). The devil can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: darkness 1/day each: harm, teleport

MonsterTrait.Name: Variant: Devil Summoning
MonsterTrait.Text: Summon Devil (1/Day): The salt devil has a 40 percent chance of summoning one salt devil

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The devil makes two scimitar attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Scimitar
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is neither undead nor a construct, it also takes 5 (1d10) necrotic damage, or half damage with a successful DC 15 Constitution saving throw. Plants, oozes, and creatures with the Amphibious, Water Breathing, or Water Form traits have disadvantage on this saving throw. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target also gains one level of exhaustion.
